Online Pathways     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Online Pathways      Online Pathways   Main Menu    Program           Courses    Pathways    FAQs         Admission Requirements    Tuition    Contact Us     Eyebrow menu    las.uic.edu    Register Now    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                               College of  Liberal Arts  and  Sciences        Online Pathways  Online Pathways             UIC’s Liberal Arts and Sciences Online Pathways program allows you to complete high-quality, low-cost General Education courses 100% online. Courses are taught by the faculty of Chicago’s leading public research university.  Each course can be a stepping stone on your path towards completing a college degree!         UIC's Strengths        4 th   in Social Mobility by U.S. News & World Report.         Top 10   Best Value College from Wall Street Journal and Times Higher Education.         3 rd   Best Online Bachelor's Programs from U.S. News & World Report.                 Online Pathways: Our Program   General Education classes for college credit in the natural sciences, humanities, social science  100% online  All classes taught by UIC faculty  8-week and 16-week sessions  Courses offered during Fall, Spring, Summer  Students will receive a UIC transcript    Learn More About Our Courses!           See where Online Pathways can take you:           Online Pathways: Our Program           Satisfy Prerequisite Requirements  for Online Degree Programs at UIC or elsewhere             Start or Resume Earning College Credit  through Discipline Exploration. Transfer credits anywhere.             Transfer to UIC  with Guaranteed Admission Options.
